name: Glimpses (sakis laspas)
description:
Glimpses is a short psychological horror, first person game inspired by H.P. Lovecraft stories.

Note from the developer:

I'm a 3D (environment) artist and I love horror games. I recently started learning programming and this is my first full game.

Let me know what you did, and what you didn't like.

I'm excited to work on more ambitious projects in the future, so if you want to support me on that consider donating :).

I highly suggest trying out "Retro" mode by pressing "R"!
